name: Headbutt Dino
description:
OH NO! A volcano erupted and YOU need to save everyone by headbutting all the meteors into space!

⚠️  The HTML version only works on Chrome-based browsers. For all you other lovely people there are exports for each platform down below 👇😄👇

Controls
  • Move using the mouse.
  • Collide violently with meteors to headbutt them into space.
  • Press escape to free your mouse

(Arrow keys and joystick are also supported, but using the mouse feels way better)

Pro Tips
  • Make sure to have enough space to move your mouse around!
  • Try not to hit the ducks please, although they won't mind that much.

Made for DINO Jam 2022. My submission of last year:

Credits
  • Art - Sander Vanhove (Me 🤗)
  • Music -  Ficus Prosound
  • Duck Sound - dobroide
  • Earth Quake Sound - NoahBangs
  • Emotion Sounds - Wowsoundsg
  • Voice Sounds - ChrisLSound
  • Explosion/Fireball/Rumble/Punch Sounds - DARK FANTASY STUDIO
  • Headhunter Font - Columbia University Music Department
  • Permanent Markter Font - Google Fonts
